verse.name: c1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Unto Him who hath loved us and washed us from sin, Unto Him be the glory forever, Amen.{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}With harps and with viols, there stand a great throng In the presence of Jesus, and sing this new song.{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: {lang-eng}All these once were sinners, defiled in his sight, Now arrayed in pure garments in praise they unite.{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: {lang-eng}He maketh the rebel a priest and a king, He hath bought us and taught us this new song to sing.{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: {lang-eng}How helpless and hopeless we sinners had been, If he never had loved us till cleansed from our sin.{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v5
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Aloud in his praises our voices shall ring, So that others believing, this new song shall sing{/lang-eng}
